memberdef.argsstring: (LightSensor_HandlePtr_T handle, uint32_t upperThreshold, uint32_t lowerThreshold, uint32_t thresholdTimer)
memberdef.name: LightSensor_configureThresholdInterrupt

briefdescription.para: function responsible to set interrupt conditions, that means, threshold boundaries and threshold timer for lightsensor interrupt. Interrupt will be fired if the light intensity is crossed threshold boundaries for a window period defined in threshold timer.User must register the callback before calling configuring interrupt

parameterdescription.para: global handle of sensor
upper threshold value to be programmed in upper threshold register for light sensor interrupt.
lower threshold value to be programmed in lower threshold register for light sensor interrupt.
threshold timer value to be programmed in threshold timer register for light sensor interrupt.
Interrupt Configuration success.
if called without initializing the sensor.
In case of invalid sensor handle.

simplesect.para: In case of other failures refer Max44009Utils_configInterrupt API's.
The return value consist of (First 1 MSByte represents Package ID, Next byte represents Severity and Last 2 LSBytes represents error code).
Pass the return value of this function to BCDS_getSensorErrorCode API to know the sensor return code present in BCDS_SensorErrorType_E.

briefdescription.para: DeInitializes the light sensor referenced by the passed handle.

parameterdescription.para: Handle to the light sensor object
Sensor De-initialization success.
In case of invalid sensor handle.

simplesect.para: In case of any other error refer Max44009Utils_uninitialize error codes.
The return value consist of (First 1 MSByte represents Package ID, Next byte represents Severity and Last 2 LSBytes represents error code).
Pass the return value of this function to BCDS_getSensorErrorCode API to know the sensor return code present in BCDS_SensorErrorType_E.

briefdescription.para: Disable Interrupt type on the handle.

parameterdescription.para: Handle to the lightSensor object
Disable interrupt status is success.
if called without initializing the sensor.
In case of invalid sensor handle.

simplesect.para: In case of other failures refer Max44009Utils_disableInterrupt API's.
The return value consist of (First 1 MSByte represents Package ID, Next byte represents Severity and Last 2 LSBytes represents error code).
Pass the return value of this function to BCDS_getSensorErrorCode API to know the sensor return code present in BCDS_SensorErrorType_E.

briefdescription.para: function to read light sensor interrupt status register

parameterdescription.para: global handle of sensor
holds the interrupt configuration that is configured
get interrupt status is success.
if called without initializing the sensor.
In case of invalid sensor handle.
In case of getting interrupt status value other than LightSensor_ConfigInterrupt_E.

simplesect.para: The return value consist of (First 1 MSByte represents Package ID, Next byte represents Severity and Last 2 LSBytes represents error code).
Pass the return value of this function to BCDS_getSensorErrorCode API to know the sensor return code present in BCDS_SensorErrorType_E.

briefdescription.para: Initializes the LightSensor referenced by the passed handle.

parameterdescription.para: Handle to the light sensor object
Light sensor initialization success.
In case of invalid sensor handle.

simplesect.para: In case of any other error refer Max44009Utils_initialize error codes.
This function needs to be called before calling any other light sensor API.
The return value consist of (First 1 MSByte represents Package ID, Next byte represents Severity and Last 2 LSBytes represents error code).
Pass the return value of this function to BCDS_getSensorErrorCode API to know the sensor return code present in BCDS_SensorErrorType_E.

briefdescription.para: function to read sensor data in milli lux.

parameterdescription.para: global handle of sensor
holds sensor data in milli lux
Reading lux data success.
if called without initializing the sensor.
In case of invalid sensor handle or NULL pointer arguments.

simplesect.para: In case of other failures refer #MAX44009_getSensorData API's.
The return value consist of (First 1 MSByte represents Package ID, Next byte represents Severity and Last 2 LSBytes represents error code).
Pass the return value of this function to BCDS_getSensorErrorCode API to know the sensor return code present in BCDS_SensorErrorType_E.

briefdescription.para: Reads raw sensor data from light sensor referenced by the passed handle.

parameterdescription.para: global handle of sensor
holds sensor data
Reading raw data success.
if called without initializing the sensor.
In case of invalid sensor handle or NULL pointer arguments.

simplesect.para: In case of other failures refer #MAX44009_getSensorData API's.
The return value consist of (First 1 MSByte represents Package ID, Next byte represents Severity and Last 2 LSBytes represents error code).
Pass the return value of this function to BCDS_getSensorErrorCode API to know the sensor return code present in BCDS_SensorErrorType_E.

briefdescription.para: function responsible to register deferred interrupt handler for light sensor. When user registers deferred callback their callback will be executed in timer daemon context, where there is no restriction of using delay functions and/or APIs related to bus access.

parameterdescription.para: global handle of sensor
function handle to register
Registering deferred time callback is success.
if called without initializing the sensor.
In case of invalid sensor handle or NULL callback.

simplesect.para: The return value consist of (First 1 MSByte represents Package ID, Next byte represents Severity and Last 2 LSBytes represents error code).
Pass the return value of this function to BCDS_getSensorErrorCode API to know the sensor return code present in BCDS_SensorErrorType_E.

briefdescription.para: function responsible to register real time interrupt handler for light sensor. When user registers real time callback their callback will be executed in ISR context. User must not use any delay functions or bus access in ISR context.

parameterdescription.para: global handle of sensor
function handle to register
Registering real time callback is success.
if called without initializing the sensor.
In case of invalid sensor handle or NULL callback.

simplesect.para: The return value consist of (First 1 MSByte represents Package ID, Next byte represents Severity and Last 2 LSBytes represents error code).
Pass the return value of this function to BCDS_getSensorErrorCode API to know the sensor return code present in BCDS_SensorErrorType_E.

briefdescription.para: function to set brightness to low or high for light sensor

parameterdescription.para: global handle of sensor
LightSensor_ConfigBrightness_T holds brightness configuration
Setting brightness success.
if called without initializing the sensor.
In case of invalid sensor handle.
In case of setting brightness other than LightSensor_ConfigBrightness_E.

simplesect.para: In case of other failures refer #MAX44009_setCdr API's.
The return value consist of (First 1 MSByte represents Package ID, Next byte represents Severity and Last 2 LSBytes represents error code).
Pass the return value of this function to BCDS_getSensorErrorCode API to know the sensor return code present in BCDS_SensorErrorType_E.

briefdescription.para: Function to enable/disable the Continuous mode for the light sensor referenced by the passed handle.

parameterdescription.para: Handle to the lightSensor object
This variable holds the Continuous mode configuration
Setting continuous mode success.
if called without initializing the sensor.
In case of invalid sensor handle.
In case of setting mode other than LightSensor_ConfigMode_E.

simplesect.para: In case of other failures refer #MAX44009_setContinousModeReg API's.
The return value consist of (First 1 MSByte represents Package ID, Next byte represents Severity and Last 2 LSBytes represents error code).
Pass the return value of this function to BCDS_getSensorErrorCode API to know the sensor return code present in BCDS_SensorErrorType_E.

briefdescription.para: function to configure integration time of light sensor.

parameterdescription.para: global handle of sensor
LightSensor_IntegrationTime_T holds the integration time configuration
Setting Integration time success.
if called without initializing the sensor.
In case of invalid sensor handle.
In case of setting integration time other than LightSensor_IntegrationTime_E.

simplesect.para: In case of other failures refer #MAX44009_setIntegrationTime API's.
The return value consist of (First 1 MSByte represents Package ID, Next byte represents Severity and Last 2 LSBytes represents error code).
Pass the return value of this function to BCDS_getSensorErrorCode API to know the sensor return code present in BCDS_SensorErrorType_E.

briefdescription.para: Function to enable/disable the Manual mode for the light sensor referenced by the passed handle.

parameterdescription.para: Handle to the lightSensor object
This variable holds the manual mode configuration
Setting manual mode success.
if called without initializing the sensor.
In case of invalid sensor handle.
In case of setting mode other than LightSensor_ConfigMode_E.

simplesect.para: In case of other failures refer #MAX44009_setManualModeReg API's.
The return value consist of (First 1 MSByte represents Package ID, Next byte represents Severity and Last 2 LSBytes represents error code).
Pass the return value of this function to BCDS_getSensorErrorCode API to know the sensor return code present in BCDS_SensorErrorType_E.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint8_t start, uint8_t end, uint8_t getValueToBeTransalated, const uint8_t *lookUpTablePtr)
memberdef.name: mappingEnumForGetFunctions

briefdescription.para: MAX44009 driver callback function that will be called during ISR.

parameterdescription.para: channel at which interrupt has occurred
edge at which interrupt has occurred falling(0) or raising edge(1)

briefdescription.para: This module is common to various light sensor. Used to initialize,configure and gets the data from the sensor.
